scripts.postinstall: cd subgraph && npm install && docker pull ghcr.io/crytic/echidna/echidna:v2.0.4
scripts.eslint: eslint tests scripts deployment utilities configuration hardhat.config.ts --ext .ts
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run solhint
scripts.staticcheck: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build:contracts
scripts.test:contracts:property: docker run --rm -v `pwd`:/nifty ghcr.io/crytic/echidna/echidna:v2.0.4 bash -c "solc-select install 0.8.17 && solc-select use 0.8.17 && echidna-test /nifty/tests/property/Nifty.test.sol --contract NiftyTest --config /nifty/tests/property/config.yaml"
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:contracts:unit && npm run test:subgraph:unit && npm run test:contracts:property
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.check:contracts:unit: npm run staticcheck && npm run test:contracts:unit
scripts.check:unit: npm run staticcheck && npm run test:unit
scripts.check: npm run check:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.analyze:setup: conda env create --file environment.yml && solc-select install 0.8.17 && solc-select use 0.8.17
scripts.analyze:slither: eval "$(conda shell.bash hook)" && conda activate nifty && slither ./contracts --solc-remaps '@openzeppelin=node_modules/@openzeppelin @chainlink=node_modules/@chainlink' --exclude naming-convention,external-function,low-level-calls --hardhat-ignore-compile
scripts.analyze:mythril: eval "$(conda shell.bash hook)" && conda activate nifty && myth analyze contracts/Nifty.sol --solc-json ./solc.json
scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:slither ; npm run analyze:mythril
scripts.deploy:contracts:staging: npm run check:contracts:unit && hardhat deploy --network goerli
scripts.deploy:contracts:production: npm run check && hardhat deploy --network mainnet
